dialogue.speaker: Knight Commander
dialogue.text: We have received reports of a dragon terrorizing a nearby village.

dialogue.speaker: Squire
dialogue.text: Shall I prepare the men for battle, sir?

dialogue.speaker: Knight Commander
dialogue.text: No, we will not be attacking the dragon. Not yet, at least.

dialogue.speaker: Squire
dialogue.text: But sir, the villagers are in danger!

dialogue.speaker: Knight Commander
dialogue.text: I am aware of that. But we need to know more about this dragon before we act.

dialogue.speaker: Squire
dialogue.text: I see. And what would you have me do, sir?

dialogue.speaker: Knight Commander
dialogue.text: Gather information about the dragon. Talk to the villagers, see if they've noticed anything unusual.

dialogue.speaker: Squire
dialogue.text: Aye, sir! I'll get right on it!
